text: My career timeline spans from 2009 to the present. I started as a Software Engineer at Pitney Bowes Software in India 2009–2011. I then moved to Germany and spent over 12 years at IHS Markit 2012–2024, progressing from Software Engineer to Senior Software Engineer, focusing on automotive software and cloud platforms. Since December 2024, I've been working as a Freelance AI Engineer Consultant, building AI products and systems. I also served as AI Architect at 12IQ Inc. from November 2025 to January 2026.
